name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.3「死者の楽園」
name_original: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.3「死者の楽園」
description:
The third installment of "The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale" series!
Shangri-La, an amusement park named after an ideal world.
In this paradise overflowing with smiles, a banquet in the name of judgment begins.
【Game System】
This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture.
The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will serve as clues to solve the case.
The story progresses by selecting commands, so even beginners can easily play the game.

【Story】
This case is a few months after the nightmare of "The Kairoukan Murder Case," the second in the series. The story begins with a visit to his friend, Kibukawa, who is in need of a new story.
At the office after a long absence, a beautiful secretary "Haruna Kikukawa", who works at the popular amusement park "Shangri-La," comes to consult.

The request was for security and investigation into a cult-like threatening letter sent to the amusement park and a spooky prank.
However, Hiroshi Kimijima, the president of the company, wants the matter handled confidentially without informing the police.
Despite their disbelief, Ikuo and Itazura head for Shangri-La.

An invitation from paradise is extended to them by a beautiful secretary. A banquet in the name of judgment begins there.
Are the cries of joy echoing in the amusement park that bears the name of an ideal world, or are they cries of delight? Or is it...?
